name: derailleur
content:

a type of bicycle gear that works by moving the bicycle chain from one sprocket wheel (= a wheel with a row of tooth-like parts) to another: Set the rear derailleur in the lowest gear, with the chain on the biggest sprocket wheel at the back. derailleur gears
